timeline.author: nmancus1
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3590,12 +3593,136 @@ * |--MODIFIERS * | `--LITERAL_PUBLIC (public) * |--LITERAL_RECORD (record) - * `--IDENT (myRecord) + * |--IDENT (myRecord) + * |--LPAREN (() + * |--RECORD_COMPONENTS + * |--RPAREN ()) + * `--OBJBLOCK + * |--LCURLY ({) + * `--RCURLY (}) * + * + * @since 8.35 */ public static final int RECORD_DEF = GeneratedJavaTokenTypes.RECORD_DEF; + /** + * Record components are a (possibly empty) list containing the components of a record, which + * are the variables that make up its state. + * + *

For example:

+ * 
+     * public record myRecord (Comp x, Comp y) { }
+     *
+ *

parses as:

+ * 
+     * RECORD_DEF
+     * |--MODIFIERS
+     * |   `--LITERAL_PUBLIC (public)
+     * |--LITERAL_RECORD (record)
+     * |--IDENT (myRecord)
+     * |--LPAREN (()
+     * |--RECORD_COMPONENTS
+     * |   |--RECORD_COMPONENT_DEF
+     * |   |   |--ANNOTATIONS
+     * |   |   |--TYPE
+     * |   |   |   `--IDENT (Comp)
+     * |   |   `--IDENT (x)
+     * |   |--COMMA (,)
+     * |   `--RECORD_COMPONENT_DEF
+     * |       |--ANNOTATIONS
+     * |       |--TYPE
+     * |       |   `--IDENT (Comp)
+     * |       `--IDENT (y)
+     * |--RPAREN ())
+     * `--OBJBLOCK
+     *      |--LCURLY ({)
+     *       `--RCURLY (})
+     *
+ * + * @since 8.36

timeline.bodyText: 8.35 was just released so this needs to be upped to 36
timeline.author: rnveach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -3572,13 +3572,16 @@
     /**
      * The {@code record} keyword.  This element appears
      * as part of a record declaration.
+     *
+     * @since 8.35

replies.bodyText: This was added in 8.35 with the preliminary record support.  Should I make this a separate PR or commit?
replies.author: nmancus1
